name: Upstairs: Endless Stairs
description:
Meet the most attaching and addicting arcade game:

Upstairs: Endless Stairs
The Great Game of Infinite Stair Climbing! Climb your way up through the endless steps to infinity!

Climb up to catch up your meeting through the infinite skyscraper steps of city!

You will have no clue how you are hooked to our stairs.
Tap Up button to run your way Upstairs through the endless stairs.
Tap Side button to change direction before you fell off the steps!
Show your sick focus to beat the high score and step upstairs!
Change character and background.

Focus and run upstairs! Change your direction to not fall off the steps!

Have fun!
